dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Elyria, a land of ancient magic and forgotten lore.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I'm on a quest to find the legendary Sword of Light. It's said to be able to vanquish any darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: But you're not the only one searching for it. A dark sorceress, Xandria, is also on the hunt.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors that Xandria has an army of undead at her command. We need to be careful.
